post.body: Hey, does anybody have trouble to set a profile picture ? It's a pain for me right now. I don't know if i'm doing it wrong

If you are a fan of self-hosted services, well... I might have something for you !
https://github.com/Kickball/awesome-selfhosted

What happen when you combine a markdown editor with a Jupyter Notebook ?? You get that https://nteract.io/
I use it and I like it !
Un string dans l'array... Ok je sors

Compared to Google, DuckDuckGo is killing it with his ton of built-in tools. https://duck.co/ia But what made me switch to it was the instant answers of stackoverflow issues. It's awesome, everyone should use it !
Hey !! Want to learn something new ? Then go checkout http://learnsomethingnew.co/ !!

comment.body: @Egoe: Yeah, i tried that before. It don't work for me. I select the image but it don't do anything

@Egoe: It's really weird, because the js console tell me that the picture has been uploaded:
[Uploadable] Uploaded  all.js:25:7
[Uploadable] Resize image loaded  all.js:25:7
[Uploadable] Size: 582 bytes  all.js:25:7
[Uploadable] Resized 50 50  all.js:25:7
@Egoe: I've also tried with Chrome and even Edge
@Flyman: It's a 128x128 png. I also tried to upload it in jpg but it doesn't work.
@Flyman: Yeah i tried that too, yesterday even XD. I'll try to fix that manually by editing some files or something. Maybe trying to use a unused zerobundle idk.
